AkCommSettings::Ports
Ports
uCommand
uDiscoveryBroadcast
uNotification
AkUInt16 AkCommSettings::Ports::uDiscoveryBroadcast

This is where the authoring application broadcasts "Game Discovery" requests to discover games running on the network. Default value: 24024.

Warning:
Unlike the other ports in this structure, this port cannot be dynamic (cannot be set to 0). Refer to initialization_comm_ports_discovery_broadcast for more details.
